author: Giovanni Raimondo
description: Originally made with Riesling Rhine wine, the Cardinale has become a Negroni made with dry vermouth, producing a lighter cocktail than when made with the more usual sweet vermouth. However, we encourage you to try the original recipe with Riesling.
name: Cardinale

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
